title: Emily McClintock Addlesperger Endowed Chair in Ovarian Cancer
description: To provide support for a faculty chair focused on screening and early detection of ovarian cancer in the Division of Gynecologic Oncology within the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for a faculty chair focused on screening and early detection of ovarian cancer in the Division of Gynecologic Oncology within the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
